nlp.token
Class TokAttr

java.lang.Object
  nlp.token.TokAttr

public class TokAttr
extends java.lang.Object

Set the attributes for a token 

 Typical use:
 Token tok = new Token(Token.TT_WORD,"word");
 TokAttr.annotate(tok);
